name: The Heavenly Duo- Badrinath and Kedarnath
description:
This trip is one of the holiest trips in India. The mystical journey starts from the holy lands of Haridwar and will take the visitors towards Kedarnath. On the way, the visitors can take bath in the hot water ponds in Gaurikund and visit the holy Gauri Temple. After trekking on foot or a ride on the pony will take the journey to Kedarnath, which is one of the auspicious abode of Lord Shiva.

After Kedarnathji, the visitors can visit Rudraprayag, where the sangam of Mandakini and Alkananda Rivers occurs. While visiting Badrinath, several religious sites can be visited including the opening of the holy Saraswati River. Rudraprayag will also be visited and after its visit, the journey will head towards Rishikesh and will finally conclude upon reaching Haridwar.
